name: Palaty
description: Palaty is a popular restaurant in Kutaisi, Georgia, known for its outstanding service and wide variety of flavors. It's a favorite among locals and visitors alike. The restaurant offers an authentic dining experience with favorites like Toma's Wine Cellar and Baraka Delicatessen. Palaty is highly recommended for those looking to experience the best flavors around Kutaisi. Whether you're interested in European cuisine or vegetarian-friendly options, Palaty has something for everyone.
reviewsOrAdvice: Highly recommended for experiencing the best local flavors with outstanding service.

name: Georgian cuisine Magnolia
description: Georgian Cuisine Magnolia is a restaurant that prides itself on delivering an authentic taste of the region's culinary heritage. As part of the Magnolia Hotel, it offers diners not only traditional Georgian dishes but also captivating views of the river and the city. The combination of its scenic location and its dedication to genuine Georgian gastronomy makes it a popular choice for both hotel guests and visiting food enthusiasts.
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect spot for traditional Georgian dishes in a pleasant setting.

name: Hacker-Pschorr Kutaisi
description: Hacker-Pschorr Kutaisi presents a welcoming pub atmosphere. This establishment offers a diverse menu that goes beyond traditional Georgian fare, featuring international favorites. Of course, it also pays homage to its location with a selection of Georgian classics, including the ever-popular khinkali. It’s a place where patrons can enjoy a relaxed meal, watch a sporting event, or simply unwind with a drink in a lively and friendly setting.
reviewsOrAdvice: Ideal for beer enthusiasts seeking a lively atmosphere and hearty food.

name: Pub Bzholebi
description: Pub Bzholebi is a beloved local haunt known for its lively atmosphere. It captures the essence of a true neighborhood pub. The interior carries a cozy and friendly vibe. Bzholebi is the go-to place for an affordable glass of local beer or chacha and simple, hearty Georgian bar snacks. It's a place of authentic social interaction, spirited conversations, and experiencing Kutaisi's vibrant, everyday nightlife in a relaxed and welcoming setting
reviewsOrAdvice: Great value for money, offering delicious flavors without breaking the bank.

name: Kutaisi Gardenia
description: Bar-Restaurant 'Kutaisi Gardenia' is located in the historical center of Kutaisi, in the area of cultural heritage monuments. The restaurant is distinguished by its ecological environment and natural beauty, as well as delicious cuisine and reasonable prices.
reviewsOrAdvice: Enjoy delicious cuisine in a beautiful, natural setting within the historical center.

name: Argonauts
description: Bar-Restaurant Argonauts Located in the central boulevard of Kutaisi, bar-restaurant Argonauts is a natural part of the historical city. Bar-restaurant Argonauts is the place where Europe meets Georgia and where food is created with a vision of the future and a synthesis of past experiences. The dishes prepared in Argonauts represent multi-layered Georgian cuisine in such a way that it is simply impossible not to fall in love with them.
reviewsOrAdvice: A central location for authentic Georgian dining.

name: Story
description: Story is a contemporary and stylish restaurant and bar that brings a modern, chic dining experience to Kutaisi. With a sleek interior design and a sophisticated atmosphere, it appeals to a fashionable crowd. The menu at Story is a fusion of Georgian and European cuisines, presenting familiar dishes with a creative and modern twist. In the evening, the venue often transitions into a lively lounge, featuring curated music and a vibrant social scene.
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect for a comfortable and warm family meal experience.

name: Maisis Ezo
description: Maisis Ezo, which translates to May's Courtyard, is a restaurant celebrated for its dedication to fresh, seasonal, and organic Georgian cuisine. The menu offers a true taste of the Imereti region's culinary traditions. The restaurant is particularly praised for its inviting outdoor dining area, making it an excellent choice during pleasant weather. The  authentic, flavorful dishes have earned Maisis Ezo a reputation of a must-visit cafe in Kutaisi.
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience a unique blend of cozy dining with cultural entertainment.

name: Bikentia's Kebabery
description: A true Kutaisi institution, Bikentia's Kebabery offers a unique and authentic taste of local culinary tradition. They serve one thing and they do it exceptionally well: succulent pork and beef kebabs wrapped in flatbread with onions and a tangy tomato-based sauce. This place is a favorite among locals and a must-visit for travelers seeking a flavorful, extremely affordable meal.
reviewsOrAdvice: An essential stop for superb kebab and beer in Kutaisi.

name: Gala Restaurant Kutaisi
description: It’s absolutely wonderful that at this place, you can not only taste delicious food but also cook traditional Georgian dishes yourself with the help of amazing chefs! Come bake your own khachapuri, fold khinkali, and enjoy the experience with friends or foreign guests. Restaurant doors are open to everyone with love.
reviewsOrAdvice: A unique culinary experience where you can learn to cook Georgian dishes with expert chefs.

name: Mini-Art
description: Mini-Art is a charming art gallery and studio that serves as a vibrant hub for local creativity in Kutaisi. This space showcases a diverse collection of works by local artists, offering a colorful and expressive journey into the region's artistic soul. Often hosted by the artists themselves, a visit to Mini-Art provides a personal and engaging experience, allowing for direct interaction with the artists. It is a perfect spot for art lovers.
reviewsOrAdvice: Combines a cozy cafe atmosphere with an intriguing art gallery.

name: Tea House Foe-Foe
description: Tea House Foe-Foe is an elegant and serene sanctuary dedicated to the art of tea. The establishment offers an extensive menu of high-quality teas from around the world. To complement the beverages, Foe-Foe presents a delectable selection of exquisite cakes, pastries, and light bites. It is a refined and peaceful retreat, ideal for quiet conversation or solitary reflection, offering a stark, pleasant contrast to the city's more bustling venues.
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect for a relaxing break, offering tea/coffee in an antique setting.

name: Lilestan
description: Lilestan is a charming restaurant in Kutaisi that offers a delightful culinary experience, blending the rich flavors of Imeretian and Georgian cuisine with a modern twist. The venue boasts colorful decor and utensils, creating one of the coziest atmospheres in the city. Visitors can expect an aristocratic atmosphere, bohemian and vintage style environment, and attentive staff with genuine smiles.
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience a cozy and aristocratic atmosphere with a modern twist on Georgian cuisine.

name: Fleur
description: Cafe Fleur in Kutaisi is a popular breakfast spot that opens at 9 am, earlier than most cafes. Guests can enjoy classic omelettes, shakshuka with homemade bread, or yogurt and fruit cups. The cafe offers beautifully decorated cappuccinos and has outdoor seating to enjoy the lively old town atmosphere. Visitors praise the attentive and friendly staff, unique menu offerings, reasonable prices, and a perfect garden for summertime.
reviewsOrAdvice: An excellent breakfast spot with a charming garden and friendly staff.

name: La Fete Kutaisi
description: La Fete Kutaisi is a charming and cozy café that offers a delightful respite from the bustling city streets. With its vintage-inspired decor, including bookshelves and quaint furnishings, it exudes a warm and inviting atmosphere. La Fete is particularly known for its excellent selection of teas and a tempting array of delicious and beautifully presented desserts. For those seeking a light meal, they also offer tasty crepes and other café-style fare.
reviewsOrAdvice: High-quality pastries blending modern and traditional recipes at great prices.

name: Newport Hotel Kutaisi
reviewsOrAdvice: A highly-rated hotel offering excellent comfort and service.

name: Agro guesthouse KORENA
location: Road to Gelati Monastery, Motsameta, Kutaisi 2708
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience warm hospitality and comfort in a unique guesthouse setting.

name: Hotel Terrace Kutaisi
reviewsOrAdvice: A well-regarded 3-star hotel with a comfortable terrace for guests.

name: Hill Hotel
reviewsOrAdvice: Offers a pleasant stay with good amenities at a reasonable price point.

name: Kutaisi Inn Hotel
reviewsOrAdvice: A premium 5-star hotel offering luxury and comfort for discerning travelers.
